validation.boolean: Value must be true or false.
validation.instanceOf: Value must be an instance of "{0}".
validation.url: Value must be a valid URL starting with "http://" or "https://".
validation.email: Value must be a valid e-mail address.
validation.ipAddress: Value must be a valid IP address.
validation.negative: Value must be a negative number.
validation.positive: Value must be a positive number.
validation.between: Value must be a number between {0} and {1}.
validation.lessThan: Value must be a number less than {0}.
validation.lessThanOrEqual: Value must be a number less than or equal to {0}.
validation.greaterThan: Value must be a number greater than {0}.
validation.greaterThanOrEqual: Value must be a number greater than or equal to {0}.
validation.even: Value must be an even number.
validation.odd: Value must be an odd number.
validation.length: Value length must be equal to {0}.
validation.minLength: Value length must be greater than {0}.
validation.maxLength: Value length must be less than {0}.
